template.name: Kobil Demo Transaction Approval
template.desc: Simple Kobil Demo with Exposition interleaved in the process. Two parties. Second party selected from drop-down.

forms.name: Select Reviewer and Submit or Cancel
Kobil Exposition 1 - simple
Approve or Reject
Kobil Exposition 2 Transaction approval message
SFDC Default View
SFDC Opportunity List/Read View
SFDC Contact

flow.name: User Approval with fact
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
    <message id="injectListJSON" name="injectListJSON"/>
    <process id="User_Approval_with_fact" name="User Approval with fact" isExecutable="true">
        <startEvent id="start" name="User Approval with fact"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow31" sourceRef="start" targetRef="serviceTask17"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask17" name="Get Message" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_GetMessage_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression/>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow32" sourceRef="serviceTask17" targetRef="serviceTask18"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask18" name="selectitem" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_selectitem_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${LIST_RECORDSMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow33" sourceRef="serviceTask18" targetRef="userTask19"/>
        <userTask id="userTask19" name="select" activiti:formKey="poi_select_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage34" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask19">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow35" sourceRef="userTask19" targetRef="userTask20"/>
        <userTask id="userTask20" name="Message" activiti:formKey="poi_Message_form" activiti:assignee="${reviewer}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage36" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask20">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow37" sourceRef="userTask20" targetRef="snapshot21"/>
        <serviceTask id="snapshot21" name="List Objects" activiti:class="plugins.SnapShot">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="recordType">
                    <activiti:expression>"snapshot21"</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow38" sourceRef="snapshot21" targetRef="serviceTask22"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask22" name="getitem" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_getitem_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${READMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow39" sourceRef="serviceTask22" targetRef="serviceTask23"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask23" name="Get Approval" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_GetApproval_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression/>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow40" sourceRef="serviceTask23" targetRef="userTask24"/>
        <userTask id="userTask24" name="Approve" activiti:formKey="poi_Approve_form" activiti:assignee="${reviewer}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage41" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask24">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow42" sourceRef="userTask24" targetRef="snapshot25"/>
        <serviceTask id="snapshot25" name="List Objects" activiti:class="plugins.SnapShot">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="recordType">
                    <activiti:expression>"snapshot25"</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow43" sourceRef="snapshot25" targetRef="userTask26"/>
        <userTask id="userTask26" name="Review" activiti:formKey="poi_Review_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage44" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask26">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow45" sourceRef="userTask26" targetRef="end"/>
        <endEvent id="end" name="end"/>
    </process>
</definitions>
